text: The Polar Star is a 1919 British silent mystery film directed by Arrigo Bocchi and starring Manora Thew, Hayford Hobbs and Peggy Patterson.Low p.429 The screenplay concerns a London soliciter who is killed in mysterious circumstances in Italy. It was made at Catford Studios and on location in Italy. ==Cast== * Manora Thew * Hayford Hobbs * Peggy Patterson * Bert Wynne * Charles Vane ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. History of the British Film, 1918–1929. title: The Polar Star
